Config.Description: Container port exposed by the FastAPI server

Config.Description: Group ID that owns files written inside the container

Config.Description: File creation mask applied before StockWorks starts

Config.Description: Optional PostgreSQL DSN shared with MakerWorks/OrderWorks

Config.Description: Credential required to log into the StockWorks UI
